resources.string: See the good happening out there

Aren\'t you tired of watching filth every recordedTime you visit your favourite Juhu beach. A bunch of enthusiastic students of Mumbai University and some working prfessionals from Bandra came together last Sunday to clean up the filth around the Chowpatty area of Juhu beach. And they have done a commendable job, you have to see it to believe it.
Successful cleanliness drive by Share, boon to our future.
It\'s your turn to start doing

Every year, Indian Development Foundation (IDF) has been joining hands with volunteers from various sectors in the beach clean-up drive the morning after the Ganpati immersion. Let\'s make it this year too. ( expandable text field )
Your meters will get converted to charity
Oops! Looks like you are Usain Bolt, will pause workout
Don\'t be too lazy, move your ass!
You need to be a little more faster!

We teach kids every day for two hours. Our focus is value based education which includes teaching and manners, inculcating sense of hygeine and helping attitude and help them realise and achieve their dreams.
Help us improve by your valuable feedback.
You are awesome! You have impacted life of 12 children uptill now

Shwas is an effort started by a group of volunteers to educate the underprivileged kids of Gulbai Tekra, Ahmedabad since year 2009. We attempt to provide safe and healthy environment to children coming from disadvantaged families, so that they can openly share with us the challenges they face that hold them back from aspiring their dreams We teach kids every day for two hours. Our focus is value based education which includes teaching manners, inculcating sense of hygiene and helping them to follow and fulfil their dreams.

I just created impact by running 12Kms for the cause. Nike is proud to sponsor the cause.
